title: I work full time, how many hours does it take to write an 18 page paper? - Quora

response.answer_text: It really depends on the genre, topic, the amount and type of research involved, and how quickly you can synthesize ideas and translate them into written English in your own head. (Also, how fast you can write/type.) My averages are one hour per page for legal briefs and 2–3 hours per page for academic articles, but I know both genres inside and out, I read very quickly, and I think and type even faster. Your mileage may vary.

Well it depends on many factors: If you were tired and don't have the energy to write fast or think of what you are going to write. Are you fast when it comes to writing?Do you have flow of information to write and not take much time to think? Distractions, how frequent are they? like sitting on your phone, email, if you have a family ( e.g. taking care of kids,cooking , cleaning etc…)
